com.przemekm.coreservicesapp.database

Class H2Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.przemekm.coreservicesapp.database.H2Database

  • public final class H2Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle all H2 database connections and queries executions.
    Author:
    Przemysław Motała

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.sql.Connection connection 
      private static java.lang.String DB_CONNECTION 
      private static java.lang.String DB_DRIVER 
      private static java.lang.String DB_PASSWORD 
      private static java.lang.String DB_USER 
      private static H2Database instance 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private H2Database()
      This constructor creates a connection with H2 database via getConnection() method call and constructs an empty data table with use of createTable() method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearTable()
      This method truncates the table ORDERS and restarts the primary key value with 1.
      void closeConnection()
      This method closes the connection with H2 database.
      private void createTable()
      This method creates a new table ORDERS with five specified columns and an auto-incrementing primary key column.
      java.util.List<Order> getAllData()
      This method retrieves all data stored in the H2 database and loads it into ArrayList of Order items.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClientIdData()
      This method retrieves all clientId data stored in the H2 database and loads it into ArrayList of String items.
      private java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      This method creates a connection with H2 database.
      static H2Database getInstance()
      This method returns a singleton instance of the H2Database class.
      Report<?> getQueryData(ReportParams reportParams)
      This method retrieves data from the H2 database based on the specified ReportParams.
      void saveData(Order order)
      This method inserts the Order data into the ORDERS table of H2 database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • H2Database

        private H2Database()
        This constructor creates a connection with H2 database via getConnection() method call and constructs an empty data table with use of createTable() method.
        See Also:
        getConnection(), createTable()

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static H2Database getInstance()
        This method returns a singleton instance of the H2Database class.
        Returns:
        instance of H2Database class.

      • createTable

        private void createTable()
        This method creates a new table ORDERS with five specified columns and an auto-incrementing primary key column. Each column represents one field from the Order class.
        See Also:
        Order, Statement.execute(String)

      • clearTable

        public void clearTable()
        This method truncates the table ORDERS and restarts the primary key value with 1.
        See Also:
        Statement.execute(String)

      • getAllData

        public java.util.List<Order> getAllData()
        This method retrieves all data stored in the H2 database and loads it into ArrayList of Order items.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all Order items retrieved from the database.
        See Also:
        ArrayList, Order

      • getClientIdData

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClientIdData()
        This method retrieves all clientId data stored in the H2 database and loads it into ArrayList of String items.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all clientId data retrieved from the database as String items.

      • getQueryData

        public Report<?> getQueryData(ReportParams reportParams)
        This method retrieves data from the H2 database based on the specified ReportParams.
        Parameters:
        reportParams - an object containing parameters needed for creation of the database query.
        Returns:
        Report with the type of ArrayList of Order items, or Report with the type of String if the ReportType parameter is not equal to ReportType.ORDERS_LIST.
        See Also:
        ReportParams, ReportType

      • getConnection

        private java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        This method creates a connection with H2 database.
        Returns:
        a connection (session) with the database.
        See Also:
        Connection

      • saveData

        public void saveData(Order order)
        This method inserts the Order data into the ORDERS table of H2 database.
        Parameters:
        order - an order to be saved in the database.
        See Also:
        Order

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        This method closes the connection with H2 database.
        See Also:
        Connection
